name: Notion Habit Tracker
description: Build better habits, one day at a timeBuilding better habits starts with awareness—and the right system to support you. This free Notion Habit Tracker template is a simple yet powerful way to stay consistent, track your progress, and reflect on what’s working (and what’s not).Whether you're just starting out or already have a few habits in motion, this tracker helps you create routines that stick. It’s available in two versions: A Simple version for everyday tracking without the fuss An Advanced
features: ASimple versionfor everyday tracking without the fuss; AnAdvanced versionwith monthly and yearly reports, perfect if you love seeing your growth in numbers over time; Monthly and yearly reportsto analyze patterns and spot trends; Define and align yourmonthly goalswith your habits
